eagle.definition: a large, strong bird with a curved beak that eats meat and can see very well
eagle.example: She finished the day one stroke behind the leader, having shot the only eagle of the tournament so far.

dog.definition: a common animal with four legs, especially kept by people as a pet or to hunt or guard things:

cat.definition: a small animal with fur, four legs, a tail, and claws, usually kept as a pet or for catching mice
